org.apache.catalina.connector
Class ResponseFacade

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.catalina.connector.ResponseFacade
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.ServletResponse
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpResponseFacade
public class ResponseFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.ServletResponse

Facade class that wraps a Catalina-internal Response object. All methods are delegated to the wrapped response.

Version:
$Revision: 466595 $ $Date: 2006-10-21 18:24:41 -0400 (Sat, 21 Oct 2006) $
Author:
Remy Maucherat
